items.content_html: InventoryEase is a lightweight and user-friendly product management system built with React and Node.js. It allows users to easily add, view, update, and manage product details such as name, price, and barcode.
items.title: Prathamesh-Maskar22/InventoryEase: InventoryEase is a lightweight and user-friendly product management system built with React and Node.js. It allows users to easily add, view, update, and manage product details such as name, price, and barcode.

items.content_html: A lightweight online coding platform inspired by LeetCode and Codeforces. Users can pick a problem and write solutions in Python or JavaScript, which are then executed securely using the Judge0 API.
items.title: Arunsp03/Code-Judge: A lightweight online coding platform inspired by LeetCode and Codeforces. Users can pick a problem and write solutions in Python or JavaScript, which are then executed securely using the Judge0 API.

items.content_html: Lightweight JavaScript wrapper for GitHub Linguist’s language detection. Detects programming languages via file extensions and file content using Linguist’s official language definitions.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight, self-hosted cloud storage solution for managing files and directories on your own server. Provides a REST API for seamless file operations, including GET, UPDATE, and DELETE for files and directories. Ideal for developers seeking a customizable, secure, and scalable storage backend.
items.title: Kiansa/cloud-storage: A lightweight, self-hosted cloud storage solution for managing files and directories on your own server. Provides a REST API for seamless file operations, including GET, UPDATE, and DELETE for files and directories. Ideal for developers seeking a customizable, secure, and scalable storage backend.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
